title: Principal with profile
description: Principal person with her profile details. It is useful for collaborative workflows where stakeholders may wish to see each other's name, (potentially) a profile avatar/picture and/or a public profile link

xdm:provider.description: The identity provider that manages this principal.

id.description: Principal id identifies a user account

type.description: The type of the principal. Acts as a processing hint to the client. Ideally, each value should be identified as a [URI](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986).

adbprincipal:profileLink.title: Image
adbprincipal:profileLink.description: Link to the public profile of the person. An example of the same is Adobe Behance public profile.

adbprincipal:anonymous.title: Guest or anonymous user
adbprincipal:anonymous.description: A user could add a annotation, live-edit or collaborate over a publically shared asset/link by providing her pseudonym (display name) and potentially solving a captcha. She need not have a permanent identity in an identity provider. In such a case, annot:anonymous would be true.
